Articles.Content: Ok, I've sent a satellite to Mun, and I'm trying to get an almost vertical orbit how do i accomplish this? Note that I've tried to do manuvuers but it makes my orbit bigger
By vertical do you mean polar? As in it goes over the north and south pole of the mun?
yes, it has and i need atleast 10 characters to post forum messages
Place a maneuver node, to do that, click on your current path in the map view. Then click and drag the purple triangles, those will change your inclination.
ok, thanks, What i needed to do was, when i was moving the purple triangles, i also need to move to "Retroburn" Icon? and it made my orbit the way i wanted thanks for the help
It is VERY fuel-expensive to put yourself in a polar orbit after you arrive. However, you can do it for peanuts if, when departing Kerbin, you angle the transit burn slightly north or south.
